expo.name: Votscape

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Votscape uses your location to show local voting data and help you find nearby polling locations.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Votscape uses your location to show local voting data and help you find nearby polling locations.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Votscape to use your location to show local voting data and help you find nearby polling locations.

expo.description: Votscape is a civic engagement app that helps citizens visualize local voting patterns and participate in democracy through interactive maps, voter registration tools, and educational resources.
